00093 
00094 bool VhdlGenerator2::parse( QSharedPointer<Component> topLevelComponent, 
00095                                                    const QString& viewName ) {
00096         
00097         Q_ASSERT(topLevelComponent);
00098         component_ = topLevelComponent;
00099 
00100         emit noticeMessage(tr("Parsing the IP-Xact models..."));
00101 
00102         // the name of the top-level entity is the name of the top-level component
00103         topLevelEntity_ = component_->getEntityName(viewName);
00104         viewName_ = viewName;
00105         
00106         parseDesignAndConfiguration();
00107 
00108         // get the types that are used for the ports.
00109         typeDefinitions_ = component_->getPortTypeDefinitions();
00110 
00111         // parse the info for the top entity
00112         parseTopGenerics();
00113         parseTopPorts();
00114 
00115         // if design is used then these can be parsed also
00116         if (design_) {
00117                 parseInstances();
00118                 parseInterconnections();
00119                 parseAdHocConnections();
00120                 parseHierConnections();
00121                 mapPorts2Signals();
00122 
00123                 // tell each instance to use the default port value for the unconnected
00124                 // ports.
00125                 foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance, instances_) {
00126                         instance->useDefaultsForOtherPorts();
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 // tell each component declaration to check for it's ports and 
00130                 // uncomment those that are needed
00131                 foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentDeclaration> comp, components_) {
00132                         comp->checkPortConnections();
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         // if design is not used then set all ports uncommented.
00136         else {
00137 
00138                 for (QMap<VhdlPortSorter, QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> >::iterator i = topPorts_.begin();
00139                         i != topPorts_.end(); ++i) {
00140 
00141                         i.value()->setCommented(false);
00142                 }
00143         }
00144 
00145         return true;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void VhdlGenerator2::generateVhdl( const QString& outputFileName) {
00149                         
00150         if (outputFileName.isEmpty()) {
00151                 return;
00152         }
00153 
00154         QFile file(outputFileName);
00155 
00156         // if previous file exists then remove it.
00157         if (file.exists()) {
00158 
00159                 // read the user-modifiable code from the file
00160                 readUserModifiablePart(file);
00161 
00162                 file.remove();
00163         }
00164 
00165         // open the file and erase all old contents if any exists
00166         // if file could not be opened
00167         if (!file.open(QFile::Truncate | QFile::WriteOnly)) {
00168 
00169                 QString message(tr("File: "));
00170                 message += outputFileName;
00171                 message += tr(" couldn't be opened for writing");
00172                 emit errorMessage(message);
00173                 return;
00174         }
00175         // now file has been opened for writing
00176 
00177         // open file stream to write to
00178         QTextStream vhdlStream(&file);
00179 
00180         QFileInfo fileInfo(outputFileName);
00181 
00182         emit noticeMessage(tr("Writing the vhdl file..."));
00183 
00184         // write header comments of the file
00185         writeVhdlHeader(vhdlStream, fileInfo.fileName());
00186 
00187         // always add IEEE library
00188         vhdlStream << "library IEEE;" << endl;
00189         vhdlStream << "library std;" << endl;
00190 
00191         // write the libraries needed 
00192         libraries_.append("work");
00193         libraries_.removeDuplicates();
00194 
00195         // declare the libraries used.
00196         foreach (QString library, libraries_) {
00197                 if (!library.isEmpty()) {
00198                         vhdlStream << "library " << library <<";" << endl;
00199                         vhdlStream << "use " << library << ".all;" << endl;
00200                 }
00201         }
00202 
00203         // write all type defs needed
00204         foreach (QString portTypeDef, typeDefinitions_) {
00205                 if (!portTypeDef.isEmpty()) {
00206                         vhdlStream << "use " << portTypeDef << ";" << endl;
00207                 }
00208         }
00209         vhdlStream << endl;
00210 
00211         // write the top-level entity
00212         vhdlStream << "entity " << topLevelEntity_ << " is" << endl;
00213         vhdlStream << endl;
00214 
00215         // write the top-level generics
00216         writeGenerics(vhdlStream);
00217 
00218         // write the top-level ports
00219         writePorts(vhdlStream);
00220 
00221         // end top-level entity definition
00222         vhdlStream << "end " << topLevelEntity_ << ";" << endl << endl;
00223 
00224         // if view has description
00225         QString viewDescription = component_->getViewDescription(viewName_);
00226         VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(viewDescription, vhdlStream);
00227 
00228         QString archName;
00229         // if view name is not specified then "rtl" is used
00230         if (viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00231                 archName = "rtl";
00232         }
00233         else {
00234                 archName = viewName_;
00235         }
00236         // write the architecture of the entity
00237         vhdlStream << "architecture " << archName << " of " << topLevelEntity_ << " is"
00238                 << endl << endl;
00239 
00240         // write declarations for signals connecting the ports
00241         writeSignalDeclarations(vhdlStream);
00242 
00243         // write all component declarations
00244         writeComponentDeclarations(vhdlStream);
00245 
00246         // write the user modifiable code 
00247         writeUserModifiedDeclarations(vhdlStream);
00248 
00249         // start writing architecture component instances
00250         vhdlStream << endl << "begin" << endl << endl;
00251 
00252         // write the user modifiable code
00253         writeUserModifiedAssignments(vhdlStream);
00254 
00255         // write the component instances
00256         writeComponentInstances(vhdlStream);
00257 
00258         vhdlStream << "end " << archName << ";" << endl << endl;
00259 
00260         file.close();
00261 
00262         emit noticeMessage(tr("Done writing the vhdl file."));
00263 
00264         return;
00265 }

00267 bool VhdlGenerator2::addRTLView( const QString& vhdlFileName ) {
00268         // ipDir represents the directory where the IP-Xact file is located in.
00269         QString ipDir(handler_->getPath(*component_->getVlnv()));
00270         if (ipDir.isEmpty()) {
00271                 emit errorMessage(tr("Path to top-component was not found."));
00272                 return false;
00273         }
00274 
00275         // get the relative path to add to file set
00276         QString relativePath = General::getRelativePath(ipDir, vhdlFileName);
00277         if (relativePath.isEmpty()) {
00278                 emit errorMessage(tr("Could not create relative path to vhdl file."));
00279                 return false;
00280         }
00281 
00282         QString fileSetName;
00283         if (!viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00284                 fileSetName = QString("%1_vhdlSource").arg(viewName_);
00285         }
00286         else {
00287                 fileSetName = QString("vhdlSource");
00288         }
00289         FileSet* topFileSet = component_->getFileSet(fileSetName);
00290 
00291         // if the top vhdl file set was not found. Create one
00292         if (!topFileSet) {
00293                 topFileSet = new FileSet(fileSetName, QString("sourceFiles"));
00294                 component_->addFileSet(topFileSet);
00295         }
00296 
00297         // create a new file
00298         File* topVhdlFile = new File(relativePath, topFileSet);
00299         topVhdlFile->addFileType(QString("vhdlSource"));
00300         topVhdlFile->setIncludeFile(true);
00301         topVhdlFile->setLogicalName("work");
00302         topVhdlFile->setCommand(QString("vcom"));
00303         topVhdlFile->setBuildFlags(QString("-quiet -check_synthesis -work work"), true);
00304 
00305         // add the new file to the file set
00306         topFileSet->addFile(topVhdlFile);
00307 
00308         QString viewName;
00309         if (!viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00310                 viewName = QString("%1_rtl").arg(viewName_);
00311         }
00312         else {
00313                 viewName = "rtl";
00314         }
00315         View* rtlView = new View(viewName);
00316 
00317         // add the spirit:envIdentifier. Only language is defined, not tool
00318         // specific settings
00319         rtlView->addEnvIdentifier(QString("VHDL:Kactus2:"));
00320 
00321         // set the language of the view.
00322         rtlView->setLanguage(QString("vhdl"));
00323 
00324         // set the model name to be the top_level architecture of the top-level
00325         // entity
00326         QString archName;
00327         if (viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00328                 archName = "rtl";
00329         }
00330         else {
00331                 archName = viewName_;
00332         }
00333         QString topEntity(QString("%1(%2)").arg(topLevelEntity_).arg(archName));
00334         rtlView->setModelName(topEntity);
00335 
00336         // set a reference to a file set
00337         rtlView->addFileSetRef(fileSetName);
00338 
00339         // add the view to the component's model
00340         component_->addView(rtlView);
00341 
00342         // find the active view used to generate the vhdl
00343         View* activeView = component_->findView(viewName_);
00344         
00345         // if the view does not exist or it is not hierarchical
00346         if (!activeView || !activeView->isHierarchical()) {
00347                 return true;
00348         }
00349 
00350         activeView->setTopLevelView(rtlView->getName());
00351 
00352         return true;
00353 }
00354 
00355 bool VhdlGenerator2::parseDesignAndConfiguration() {
00356         Q_ASSERT(component_);
00357 
00358         // if view is not specified it is not error it just means that only
00359         // the top entity should be created
00360         if (viewName_.isEmpty()) {
00361                 return true;
00362         }
00363 
00364         // if view is specified but it does not exist
00365         View* view = component_->findView(viewName_);
00366         
00367         // if view is not found
00368         if (!view) {
00369                 return false;
00370         }
00371         else if (!view->isHierarchical()) {
00372                 return false;
00373         }
00374 
00375         VLNV hierarchyRef = view->getHierarchyRef();
00376         
00377         // get the type of document for the hierarchical reference
00378         VLNV::IPXactType documentType = handler_->getDocumentType(hierarchyRef);
00379 
00380         // if configuration is used
00381         if (documentType == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00382                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(hierarchyRef);
00383                 desConf_ = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00384         }
00385         // if the referenced document was not found
00386         else if (documentType == VLNV::INVALID) {
00387                 emit errorMessage(tr("The Hierarchical reference %1 within component %2's"
00388                         " view %3 was not found in library.").arg(
00389                         hierarchyRef.toString()).arg(
00390                         component_->getVlnv()->toString()).arg(
00391                         viewName_));
00392                 return false;
00393         }
00394         
00395         design_ = handler_->getDesign(hierarchyRef);
00396         // if design was not found
00397         if (!design_) {
00398                 VLNV designVLNV = handler_->getDesignVLNV(hierarchyRef);
00399                 emit errorMessage(tr("The design %1 referenced in component %2 was not "
00400                         "found in library.").arg(
00401                         designVLNV.toString()).arg(component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00402                 return false;
00403         }
00404 
00405         // the design and possibly the configuration are now parsed
00406         return true;
00407 }
00408 
00409 bool VhdlGenerator2::containsArchitecture() const {
00410         // if design exists then architecture can be created
00411         return design_;
00412 }

00414 void VhdlGenerator2::parseTopGenerics() {
00415 
00416         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > modelParams = component_->getModelParameters();
00417         foreach (QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParam, modelParams) {
00418                 QString name = modelParam->getName();
00419                 QSharedPointer<VhdlGeneric> generic(new VhdlGeneric(this, modelParam.data()));
00420 
00421                 topGenerics_.insert(name, generic);
00422         }
00423 }
00424 
00425 void VhdlGenerator2::parseTopPorts() {
00426         
00427         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<Port> > ports = component_->getPorts();
00428         foreach (QSharedPointer<Port> port, ports) {
00429 
00430                 // do not add ports with invalid direction or phantom direction
00431                 if (port->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_INVALID ||
00432                         port->getDirection() == General::DIRECTION_PHANTOM) {
00433                                 continue;
00434                 }
00435 
00436                 // create the actual port
00437                 QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> vhdlPort(new VhdlPort(this, port.data()));
00438 
00439                 // create the sorter instance
00440                 VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(vhdlPort->name()),
00441                         vhdlPort->name(), port->getDirection());
00442 
00443                 // this port can not be created yet
00444                 Q_ASSERT(!topPorts_.contains(sorter));
00445 
00446                 topPorts_.insert(sorter, vhdlPort);
00447         }
00448 }
00449 
00450 void VhdlGenerator2::parseInstances() {
00451         Q_ASSERT(design_);
00452 
00453         QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances =
00454                 design_->getComponentInstances();
00455 
00456         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance instance, instances) {
00457                 VLNV::IPXactType instanceType = handler_->getDocumentType(instance.componentRef);
00458 
00459                 // if vlnv is not found in library
00460                 if (instanceType == VLNV::INVALID) {
00461                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1 referenced in desgin %2 was not"
00462                                 " found in library.").arg(
00463                                 instance.componentRef.toString()).arg(
00464                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00465                         continue;
00466                 }
00467                 // if vlnv does not reference a component
00468                 else if (instanceType != VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00469                         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1 does not belong to a component.").arg(
00470                                 instance.componentRef.toString()));
00471                         continue;
00472                 }
00473 
00474                 // pointer to the matching component declaration
00475                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentDeclaration> compDeclaration;
00476                 
00477                 // if component declaration is already created
00478                 if (components_.contains(instance.componentRef)) {
00479                         compDeclaration = components_.value(instance.componentRef);
00480                 }
00481 
00482                 // if component declaration is not yet created then create it
00483                 else {
00484                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00485                         QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00486                         Q_ASSERT(component);
00487                         compDeclaration = QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentDeclaration>(
00488                                 new VhdlComponentDeclaration(component, this));
00489 
00490                         components_.insert(instance.componentRef, compDeclaration);
00491                 }
00492                 Q_ASSERT(compDeclaration);
00493 
00494                 QString instanceActiveView;
00495                 // if configuration is used then get the active view for the instance
00496                 if (desConf_) {
00497                         instanceActiveView = desConf_->getActiveView(instance.instanceName);
00498                 }
00499 
00500                 // create the instance
00501                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> compInstance(new VhdlComponentInstance(
00502                         this, compDeclaration.data(), instance.instanceName, instanceActiveView,
00503                         instance.description));
00504 
00505                 // add the libraries of the instantiated component to the library list.
00506                 libraries_.append(compInstance->componentModel()->getVhdlLibraries(instanceActiveView));
00507 
00508                 // add each generic value to instances generic map
00509                 for (QMap<QString, QString>::iterator i = instance.configurableElementValues.begin();
00510                         i != instance.configurableElementValues.end(); ++i) {
00511                         compInstance->addGenericMap(i.key(), i.value());
00512                 }
00513 
00514                 // register the instance to the component declaration
00515                 compDeclaration->addInstantiation(compInstance);
00516 
00517                 instances_.insert(instance.instanceName, compInstance);
00518         }
00519 }
00520 
00521 void VhdlGenerator2::parseInterconnections() {
00522         Q_ASSERT(design_);
00523 
00524         QList<Design::Interconnection> interconnections =
00525                 design_->getInterconnections();
00526 
00527         QStringList connectionNames;
00528         foreach (Design::Interconnection interconnection, interconnections) {
00529 
00530                 bool invalidInterconnection = false;
00531                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance1;
00532                 BusInterface* interface1 = 0;
00533                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance2;
00534                 BusInterface* interface2 = 0;
00535                 
00536                 // if there are several interconnections with same name
00537                 if (connectionNames.contains(interconnection.name)) {
00538                         emit errorMessage(tr("Design %1 contained more than one interconnection"
00539                                 " named %2").arg(
00540                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString()).arg(
00541                                 interconnection.name));
00542                 }
00543                 else {
00544                         connectionNames.append(interconnection.name);
00545                 }
00546 
00547                 // if the instance reference is incorrect
00548                 if (!instances_.contains(interconnection.interface1.componentRef)) {
00549                         invalidInterconnection = true;
00550                         emit errorMessage(tr("Instance %1 was not found in component %2.").arg(
00551                                 interconnection.interface1.componentRef).arg(
00552                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00553                 }
00554                 else { 
00555                         instance1 = instances_.value(interconnection.interface1.componentRef);
00556                         interface1 = instance1->interface(interconnection.interface1.busRef);
00557                 }
00558                 // if the interface is not found
00559                 if (!interface1) {
00560                         emit errorMessage(tr("Bus interface %1 was not found in component %2.").arg(
00561                                 interconnection.interface1.busRef).arg(
00562                                 instance1->vlnv().toString()));
00563                         invalidInterconnection = true;
00564                 }
00565 
00566                 // if the instance reference is incorrect
00567                 if (!instances_.contains(interconnection.interface2.componentRef)) {
00568                         invalidInterconnection = true;
00569                         emit errorMessage(tr("Instance %1 was not found in component %2.").arg(
00570                                 interconnection.interface2.componentRef).arg(
00571                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00572                 }
00573                 else {
00574                         instance2 = instances_.value(interconnection.interface2.componentRef);
00575                         interface2 = instance2->interface(interconnection.interface2.busRef);
00576                 }
00577                 // if the interface is not found
00578                 if (!interface2) {
00579                         emit errorMessage(tr("Bus interface %1 was not found in component %2.").arg(
00580                                 interconnection.interface2.busRef).arg(
00581                                 instance2->vlnv().toString()));
00582                         invalidInterconnection = true;
00583                 }
00584 
00585                 // if the interconnection is invalid then move on to next interconnection
00586                 if (invalidInterconnection) {
00587                         continue;
00588                 }
00589                 else {
00590                         connectInterfaces(interconnection.name, interconnection.description,
00591                                 instance1, interface1, instance2, interface2);
00592                 }
00593         }
00594 }
00595 
00596 void VhdlGenerator2::connectInterfaces( const QString& connectionName, 
00597                                                                            const QString& description, 
00598                                                                            QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance1,
00599                                                                            BusInterface* interface1,
00600                                                                            QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance2,
00601                                                                            BusInterface* interface2 ) {
00602         Q_ASSERT(instance1);
00603         Q_ASSERT(interface1);
00604         Q_ASSERT(instance2);
00605         Q_ASSERT(interface2);
00606 
00607         // get the port maps of both interfaces
00608         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps1 = interface1->getPortMaps();
00609         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps2 = interface2->getPortMaps();
00610 
00611         // get the IP-Xact models of both instances
00612         QSharedPointer<Component> component1 = instance1->componentModel();
00613         QSharedPointer<Component> component2 = instance2->componentModel();
00614 
00615         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap1, portMaps1) {
00616                 foreach(QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap2, portMaps2) {
00617 
00618                         const QString port1Name = portMap1->physicalPort_;
00619                         const QString port2Name = portMap2->physicalPort_;
00620 
00621                         // if the port maps are not for same logical signal
00622                         if (portMap1->logicalPort_ != portMap2->logicalPort_) {
00623                                 continue;
00624                         }
00625                         // if port does not exist in instance 1
00626                         else if (!component1->hasPort(port1Name)) {
00627                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not defined in component %2.").arg(
00628                                         port1Name).arg(
00629                                         component1->getVlnv()->toString()));
00630                                 continue;
00631                         }
00632                         // if port does not exist in instance 2
00633                         else if (!component2->hasPort(port2Name)) {
00634                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not defined in component %2.").arg(
00635                                         port2Name).arg(
00636                                         component2->getVlnv()->toString()));
00637                                 continue;
00638                         }
00639                         // if the port on instance 1 is not valid physical port
00640                         else if (!component1->isPhysicalPort(port1Name)) {
00641                                 continue;
00642                         }
00643                         // if the port on instance 2 is not valid physical port
00644                         else if (!component2->isPhysicalPort(port2Name)) {
00645                                 continue;
00646                         }
00647 
00648                         // get the alignments of the ports
00649                         General::PortAlignment alignment = 
00650                                 General::calculatePortAlignment(portMap1.data(), 
00651                                 component1->getPortLeftBound(port1Name),
00652                                 component1->getPortRightBound(port1Name),
00653                                 portMap2.data(),
00654                                 component2->getPortLeftBound(port2Name),
00655                                 component2->getPortRightBound(port2Name));
00656 
00657                         // if the alignment is not valid (port sizes do not match or 
00658                         // they do not have any common bits)
00659                         if (alignment.invalidAlignment_) {
00660                                 continue;
00661                         }
00662 
00663                         // create the name for the signal to be created
00664                         const QString signalName = connectionName + portMap1->logicalPort_;
00665 
00666                         VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection port1(instance1, port1Name, 
00667                                 alignment.port1Left_, alignment.port1Right_);
00668                         VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection port2(instance2, port2Name,
00669                                 alignment.port2Left_, alignment.port2Right_);
00670                         QList<VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection> ports;
00671                         ports.append(port1);
00672                         ports.append(port2);
00673 
00674                         // connect the port from both port maps
00675                         connectPorts(signalName, description, ports);
00676                 }
00677         }
00678 }
00679 
00680 void VhdlGenerator2::connectPorts(const QString& connectionName, 
00681                                                                   const QString& description, 
00682                                                                   const QList<VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection>& ports) {
00683 
00684         // at least 2 ports must be found
00685         Q_ASSERT(ports.size() > 1);
00686 
00687         // calculate the bounds for the signal
00688         int left = ports.first().leftBound_;
00689         int right = ports.first().rightBound_;
00690         QString type = ports.first().instance_->portType(ports.first().portName_);
00691 
00692         // create the endPoints
00693         QList<VhdlConnectionEndPoint> endPoints;
00694         foreach (VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection connection, ports) {
00695 
00696                 QString connectionType = connection.instance_->portType(connection.portName_);
00697 
00698                 // make sure all ports are for same type
00699                 if (type != connectionType) {
00700                         QString instance1(QString("instance %1 port %2 type %3").arg(
00701                                 ports.first().instance_->name()).arg(
00702                                 ports.first().portName_).arg(
00703                                 type));
00704                         QString instance2(QString("instance %1 port %2 type %3").arg(
00705                                 connection.instance_->name()).arg(
00706                                 connection.portName_).arg(
00707                                 connectionType));
00708                         emit errorMessage(tr("Type mismatch: %1 - %2.").arg(
00709                                 instance1).arg(
00710                                 instance2));
00711                 }
00712 
00713                 VhdlConnectionEndPoint endPoint(connection.instance_->name(), connection.portName_,
00714                         connection.leftBound_, connection.rightBound_, left, right);
00715                 endPoints.append(endPoint);
00716         }
00717 
00718         // the signal that connects the end points
00719         QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> signal;
00720 
00721         // find a signal to use for connecting the end points
00722         foreach (VhdlConnectionEndPoint endPoint, endPoints) {
00723                 if (signals_.contains(endPoint)) {
00724                         signal = signals_.value(endPoint);
00725                         signal->setBounds(qMax(left, int(signal->left())),
00726                                 qMin(right, int(signal->right())));
00727                         break;
00728                 }
00729         }
00730         // if signal was not found then create a new one 
00731         if (!signal) {
00732                 signal = QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal>(new VhdlSignal(this, connectionName,
00733                         type, left, right, description));
00734                 signal->setBounds(left, right);
00735         }
00736 
00737         // connect each end point to given signal
00738         foreach (VhdlConnectionEndPoint endPoint, endPoints) {
00739                 connectEndPoint(endPoint, signal);
00740         }
00741 }
00742 
00743 void VhdlGenerator2::connectEndPoint( const VhdlConnectionEndPoint& endPoint,
00744                                                                          const QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> signal ) {
00745 
00746         Q_ASSERT(signal);
00747 
00748         // if the end point already has a signal associated with it
00749         if (signals_.contains(endPoint)) {
00750 
00751                 QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> oldSignal = signals_.value(endPoint);
00752                 // get all end points associated with signal for endpoint 2
00753                 QList<VhdlConnectionEndPoint> endPoints = signals_.keys(oldSignal);
00754                 // replace each end point with association to signal for endpoint
00755                 foreach (VhdlConnectionEndPoint temp, endPoints) {
00756                         signals_.insert(temp, signal);
00757                 }
00758         }
00759         // if end point was not yet specified
00760         else {
00761                 signals_.insert(endPoint, signal);
00762         }
00763 }
00764 
00765 void VhdlGenerator2::parseAdHocConnections() {
00766         // all adHoc connections are processed
00767         QList<Design::AdHocConnection> adHocs = design_->getAdHocConnections();
00768         foreach (Design::AdHocConnection adHoc, adHocs) {
00769 
00770                 // the data structure to store the ports to connect
00771                 QList<VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection> ports;
00772 
00773                 foreach (Design::PortRef portRef, adHoc.internalPortReferences) {
00774 
00775                         // if the instance is not found
00776                         if (!instances_.contains(portRef.componentRef)) {
00777                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Instance %1 was not found in design.").arg(
00778                                         portRef.componentRef));
00779                                 continue;
00780                         }
00781                         QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance =
00782                                 instances_.value(portRef.componentRef);
00783 
00784                         // if the specified port is not found
00785                         if (!instance->hasPort(portRef.portRef)) {
00786                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not found in instance %2 of"
00787                                         " type %3").arg(portRef.portRef).arg(
00788                                         portRef.componentRef).arg(
00789                                         instance->vlnv().toString()));
00790                                 continue;
00791                         }
00792 
00793                         // create the port specification
00794                         VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection port(instance, portRef.componentRef,
00795                                 portRef.left, portRef.right);
00796 
00797                         // add port to the list
00798                         ports.append(port);
00799                 }
00800 
00801                 // if the connection contains at least one port of the top component
00802                 if (!adHoc.externalPortReferences.isEmpty()) {
00803 
00804                         // connect each external port to instance port
00805                         foreach (Design::PortRef portRef, adHoc.externalPortReferences) {
00806 
00807                                 // check that the port is found 
00808                                 VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(portRef.portRef),
00809                                         portRef.portRef, 
00810                                         component_->getPortDirection(portRef.portRef));
00811                                 if (!topPorts_.contains(sorter)) {
00812                                         emit errorMessage(tr("The port %1 is not found in top component %2").arg(
00813                                                 portRef.portRef).arg(component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00814                                         continue;
00815                                 }
00816 
00817                                 // connect each instance port to the top port
00818                                 connectHierPort(portRef.portRef, portRef.left, portRef.right, ports);
00819                         }
00820                 }
00821                 // otherwise the connection is just between the ports of the instances
00822                 else {
00823 
00824                         // connect the ports 
00825                         connectPorts(adHoc.name, adHoc.description, ports);
00826                 }
00827         }
00828 }
00829 
00830 void VhdlGenerator2::connectHierPort( const QString& topPort,
00831                                                                          int leftBound, 
00832                                                                          int rightBound, 
00833                                                                          const QList<VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection>& ports ) {
00834 
00835         foreach (VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection port, ports) {
00836                 
00837                 // if port is scalar then don't add the bit boundaries
00838                 int portLeft = port.leftBound_;
00839                 int portRight = port.rightBound_;
00840                 if (portLeft == portRight || port.instance_->isScalarPort(port.portName_)) {
00841                         portLeft = -1;
00842                         portRight = -1;
00843                 }
00844 
00845                 VhdlPortSorter sorter(component_->getInterfaceNameForPort(topPort), 
00846                         topPort, component_->getPortDirection(topPort));
00847                 // if the port was found in top component then set it as uncommented 
00848                 // because it is needed
00849                 if (topPorts_.contains(sorter)) {
00850                         QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> vhdlPort = topPorts_.value(sorter);
00851                         vhdlPort->setCommented(false);
00852 
00853                         // if the top port is scalar then don't use the bit boundaries
00854                         if (leftBound == rightBound || VhdlGeneral::isScalarType(vhdlPort->type())) {
00855                                 leftBound = -1;
00856                                 rightBound = -1;
00857                         }
00858                 }
00859                 else {
00860                         emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not found in top component %2.").arg(
00861                                 topPort).arg(component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00862                         continue;
00863                 }
00864 
00865                 // tell each instance to create a port map between the ports
00866                 port.instance_->addPortMap(port.portName_, portLeft, portRight,
00867                         topPort, leftBound, rightBound);
00868         }
00869 }
00870 
00871 void VhdlGenerator2::parseHierConnections() {
00872         // search all hierConnections within design
00873         QList<Design::HierConnection> hierConnections =
00874                 design_->getHierarchicalConnections();
00875 
00876         foreach (Design::HierConnection hierConnection, hierConnections) {
00877         
00878                 // find the top-level bus interface
00879                 BusInterface* topInterface =
00880                         component_->getBusInterface(hierConnection.interfaceRef);
00881 
00882                 // if the top level interface couldn't be found
00883                 if (!topInterface) {
00884                         emit errorMessage(tr("Interface %1 was not found in top component %2.").arg(
00885                                 hierConnection.interfaceRef).arg(
00886                                 component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00887                         continue;
00888                 }
00889 
00890                 // find the component instance for this hierConnection
00891                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance = instances_.value(hierConnection.interface_.componentRef);
00892 
00893                 // if the component instance couldn't be found
00894                 if (!instance) {
00895                         emit errorMessage(tr("Instance %1 was not found in design.").arg(
00896                                 hierConnection.interface_.componentRef));
00897                         continue;
00898                 }
00899 
00900                 // find the bus interface
00901                 BusInterface* instanceInterface = instance->interface(hierConnection.interface_.busRef);
00902                 // if bus interface couldn't be found
00903                 if (!instanceInterface) {
00904                         emit errorMessage(tr("Interface %1 was not found in instance %2 of type %3").arg(
00905                                 hierConnection.interface_.busRef).arg(
00906                                 instance->name()).arg(
00907                                 instance->typeName()));
00908                         continue;
00909                 }
00910 
00911                 connectHierInterface(instance, instanceInterface, topInterface);
00912         }
00913 }
00914 
00915 void VhdlGenerator2::connectHierInterface( QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance, 
00916                                                                                   BusInterface* instanceInterface,
00917                                                                                   BusInterface* topInterface ) {
00918         Q_ASSERT(instance);
00919         Q_ASSERT(instanceInterface);
00920         Q_ASSERT(topInterface);
00921 
00922         // get the port maps of both interfaces
00923         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > portMaps = instanceInterface->getPortMaps();
00924         QList<QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> > hierPortMaps = topInterface->getPortMaps();
00925 
00926         // get the IP-Xact model of the instance
00927         QSharedPointer<Component> component1 = instance->componentModel();
00928 
00929         foreach (QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> portMap, portMaps) {
00930                 foreach(QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> hierPortMap, hierPortMaps) {
00931 
00932                         const QString portName = portMap->physicalPort_;
00933                         const QString hierPortName = hierPortMap->physicalPort_;
00934 
00935                         // if the port maps are not for same logical signal
00936                         if (portMap->logicalPort_ != hierPortMap->logicalPort_) {
00937                                 continue;
00938                         }
00939                         // if port does not exist in instance 1
00940                         else if (!component1->hasPort(portName)) {
00941                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not defined in component %2.").arg(
00942                                         portName).arg(
00943                                         component1->getVlnv()->toString()));
00944                                 continue;
00945                         }
00946                         // if port does not exist in instance 2
00947                         else if (!component_->hasPort(hierPortName)) {
00948                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Port %1 was not defined in component %2.").arg(
00949                                         hierPortName).arg(
00950                                         component_->getVlnv()->toString()));
00951                                 continue;
00952                         }
00953                         // if the port on instance 1 is not valid physical port
00954                         else if (!component1->isPhysicalPort(portName)) {
00955                                 continue;
00956                         }
00957                         // if the port on instance 2 is not valid physical port
00958                         else if (!component_->isPhysicalPort(hierPortName)) {
00959                                 continue;
00960                         }
00961 
00962                         // get the alignments of the ports
00963                         General::PortAlignment alignment = 
00964                                 General::calculatePortAlignment(portMap.data(), 
00965                                 component1->getPortLeftBound(portName),
00966                                 component1->getPortRightBound(portName),
00967                                 hierPortMap.data(),
00968                                 component_->getPortLeftBound(hierPortName),
00969                                 component_->getPortRightBound(hierPortName));
00970 
00971                         // if the alignment is not valid (port sizes do not match or 
00972                         // they do not have any common bits)
00973                         if (alignment.invalidAlignment_) {
00974                                 continue;
00975                         }
00976 
00977                         VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection port1(instance, portName, 
00978                                 alignment.port1Left_, alignment.port1Right_);
00979                         QList<VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection> ports;
00980                         ports.append(port1);
00981 
00982                         // connect the port from instance to the top port
00983                         connectHierPort(hierPortName, alignment.port2Left_, alignment.port2Right_, ports);
00984                 }
00985         }
00986 }
00987 
00988 void VhdlGenerator2::mapPorts2Signals() {
00989         // search each endpoint
00990         for (QMap<VhdlConnectionEndPoint, QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> >::iterator i = signals_.begin(); 
00991                 i != signals_.end(); ++i) {
00992 
00993                 // if the component instance can't be found
00994                 if (!instances_.contains(i.key().instanceName())) {
00995                         emit errorMessage(tr("Instance %1 was not found in design.").arg(
00996                                 i.key().instanceName()));
00997                         continue;
00998                 }
00999 
01000                 // find the instance for the end point
01001                 QSharedPointer<VhdlComponentInstance> instance = instances_.value(i.key().instanceName());
01002 
01003                 // if port is scalar then don't add the bit boundaries
01004                 int portLeft = i.key().portLeft();
01005                 int portRight = i.key().portRight();
01006                 if (portLeft == portRight || instance->isScalarPort(i.key().portName())) {
01007                         portLeft = -1;
01008                         portRight = -1;
01009                 }
01010 
01011                 // if signal is scalar then don't add the bit boundaries
01012                 int signalLeft = i.key().signalLeft();
01013                 int signalRight = i.key().signalRight();
01014                 if (signalLeft == signalRight || VhdlGeneral::isScalarType(i.value()->type())) {
01015                         signalLeft = -1;
01016                         signalRight = -1;
01017                 }
01018 
01019                 // add a port map for the instance to connect port to signal
01020                 instance->addPortMap(i.key().portName(), portLeft, portRight,
01021                         i.value()->name(), signalLeft, signalRight);    
01022         }
01023 }

01025 void VhdlGenerator2::writeVhdlHeader( QTextStream& vhdlStream, const QString& fileName ) {
01026         
01027         vhdlStream << "-- ***************************************************" << endl;
01028         vhdlStream << "-- File: " << fileName << endl;
01029         vhdlStream << "-- Creation date: " << QDate::currentDate().toString(QString("dd.MM.yyyy")) << endl;
01030         vhdlStream << "-- Creation time: " << QTime::currentTime().toString(QString("hh:mm:ss")) << endl;
01031         vhdlStream << "-- Description: ";
01032         VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(component_->getDescription(), vhdlStream, QString("") ,false);
01033 
01034         QSettings settings;
01035         QString userName = settings.value("general/username", getenv("USERNAME")).toString();
01036         vhdlStream << "-- Created by: " << userName << endl; 
01037         vhdlStream << "-- This file was generated with Kactus2 vhdl generator." << endl;
01038         vhdlStream << "-- ***************************************************" << endl;
01039 }

01041 void VhdlGenerator2::writeGenerics( QTextStream& vhdlStream ) {
01042         // if generics exist
01043         if (!topGenerics_.isEmpty()) {
01044 
01045                 // the start tag
01046                 vhdlStream << "\tgeneric (" << endl;
01047 
01048                 for (QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<VhdlGeneric> >::iterator i = topGenerics_.begin();
01049                         i != topGenerics_.end(); ++i) {
01050 
01051                         vhdlStream << "\t\t";
01052                         i.value()->write(vhdlStream);
01053 
01054                         // if this is not the last generic
01055                         if (i != topGenerics_.end() - 1) {
01056                                 vhdlStream << ";";
01057                         }
01058                         // if it was last generic
01059                         else {
01060                                 vhdlStream << ");";
01061                         }
01062 
01063                         if (!i.value()->description().isEmpty()) {
01064                                 vhdlStream << " ";
01065                                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(i.value()->description(), vhdlStream);
01066                         }
01067                         else {
01068                                 vhdlStream << endl;
01069                         }
01070                 }
01071                 vhdlStream << endl;
01072         }
01073 }
01074 
01075 void VhdlGenerator2::writePorts( QTextStream& vhdlStream ) {
01076         // if ports exist
01077         if (!topPorts_.isEmpty()) {
01078 
01079                 vhdlStream << "\tport (" << endl;
01080 
01081                 QString previousInterface;
01082                 // print each port
01083                 for (QMap<VhdlPortSorter, QSharedPointer<VhdlPort> >::iterator i = topPorts_.begin();
01084                         i != topPorts_.end(); ++i) {
01085 
01086                                 // if the port is first in the interface then introduce it
01087                                 if (i.key().interface() != previousInterface) {
01088                                         const QString interfaceName = i.key().interface();
01089 
01090                                         vhdlStream << endl << "\t\t-- ";
01091 
01092                                         if (interfaceName == QString("none")) {
01093                                                 vhdlStream << "These ports are not in any interface" << endl;
01094                                         }
01095                                         else if (interfaceName == QString("several")) {
01096                                                 vhdlStream << "There ports are contained in many interfaces" << endl;
01097                                         }
01098                                         else {  
01099                                                 vhdlStream << "Interface: " << interfaceName << endl;
01100                                                 const QString description = component_->getInterfaceDescription(
01101                                                         interfaceName);
01102                                                 if (!description.isEmpty()) {
01103                                                         vhdlStream << "\t\t";
01104                                                         VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(description, vhdlStream, QString("\t\t"));
01105                                                 }
01106                                         }
01107                                         previousInterface = interfaceName;
01108                                 }
01109 
01110                                 // write the port name and direction
01111                                 vhdlStream << "\t\t";
01112                                 i.value()->write(vhdlStream);
01113 
01114                                 // if the last port is written
01115                                 if ( i == --topPorts_.end()) {
01116                                         vhdlStream << ");";
01117                                 }
01118                                 // if theres more ports left
01119                                 else {
01120                                         vhdlStream << ";";
01121                                 }
01122                                 
01123                                 if (!i.value()->description().isEmpty()) {
01124                                         vhdlStream << " ";
01125                                         VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(i.value()->description(), vhdlStream);
01126                                 }
01127                                 else {
01128                                         vhdlStream << endl;
01129                                 }
01130                 }
01131                 // write extra empty line to make code readable
01132                 vhdlStream << endl;
01133         }
01134 }

01136 void VhdlGenerator2::writeSignalDeclarations( QTextStream& vhdlStream ) {
01137         
01138         QList<QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> > signalList;
01139 
01140         // get the unique signals that exist
01141         foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> signal, signals_.values()) {
01142                 if (!signalList.contains(signal)) {
01143                         signalList.append(signal);
01144                 }
01145         }
01146         // when the list contains only the unique signals then write them
01147         foreach (QSharedPointer<VhdlSignal> signal, signalList) {
01148                 signal->write(vhdlStream);
01149         }
01150         vhdlStream << endl;
01151 }

01166 
01167 void VhdlGenerator2::readUserModifiablePart( QFile& previousFile ) {
01168         Q_ASSERT(previousFile.exists());
01169 
01170         // clear the previous stuff
01171         userModifiedAssignments_.clear();
01172         userModifiedDeclarations_.clear();
01173 
01174         // open the file
01175         // if file could not be opened
01176         if (!previousFile.open(QFile::ReadOnly)) {
01177 
01178                 QString message(tr("File: "));
01179                 message += previousFile.fileName();
01180                 message += tr(" couldn't be opened for reading");
01181                 emit errorMessage(message);
01182                 return;
01183         }
01184 
01185         QTextStream stream(&previousFile);
01186 
01187         bool readingDeclarations = false;
01188         bool readingAssignments = false;
01189 
01190         // read as long as theres stuff in the stream to read.
01191         while (!stream.atEnd()) {
01192                 QString line = stream.readLine();
01193 
01194                 QString lineCompare = line.trimmed();
01195 
01196                 // if next line starts the declarations
01197                 if (lineCompare == BLACK_BOX_DECL_START) {
01198                         readingDeclarations = true;
01199                 }
01200                 // if previous line was the last one of the declarations
01201                 else if (lineCompare == BLACK_BOX_DECL_END) {
01202                         readingDeclarations = false;
01203                 }
01204                 // if the next line starts the assignments
01205                 else if (lineCompare == BLACK_BOX_ASSIGN_START) {
01206                         readingAssignments = true;
01207                 }
01208                 // if previous line was the last of the assignments
01209                 else if (lineCompare == BLACK_BOX_ASSIGN_END) {
01210                         readingAssignments = false;
01211                 }
01212                 // if the line is part of the declarations
01213                 else if (readingDeclarations) {
01214                         // add the line to the declarations
01215                         userModifiedDeclarations_ += line;
01216                         userModifiedDeclarations_ += QString("\n");
01217                 }
01218                 // if the line is part of the assignments
01219                 else if (readingAssignments) {
01220                         // add the line to the assignments
01221                         userModifiedAssignments_ += line;
01222                         userModifiedAssignments_ += QString("\n");
01223                 }
01224         }
01225 
01226         previousFile.close();
01227 }
01228 
01229 void VhdlGenerator2::writeUserModifiedDeclarations( QTextStream& stream ) {
01230         stream << "\t-- You can write vhdl code after this tag and it is saved through the generator." << endl;
01231         stream << "\t" << BLACK_BOX_DECL_START << endl;
01232         stream << userModifiedDeclarations_;
01233         stream << "\t" << BLACK_BOX_DECL_END << endl;
01234         stream << "\t-- Stop writing your code after this tag." << endl << endl;
01235 }

01237 void VhdlGenerator2::writeUserModifiedAssignments( QTextStream& stream ) {
01238         stream << "\t-- You can write vhdl code after this tag and it is saved through the generator." << endl;
01239         stream << "\t" << BLACK_BOX_ASSIGN_START << endl;
01240         stream << userModifiedAssignments_;
01241         stream << "\t" << BLACK_BOX_ASSIGN_END << endl;
01242         stream << "\t-- Stop writing your code after this tag." << endl << endl;
01243 }

01263 VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection& VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection::operator=(
01264         const VhdlGenerator2::PortConnection& other ) {
01265                 if (this != &other) {
01266                         instance_ = other.instance_;
01267                         portName_ = other.portName_;
01268                         leftBound_ = other.leftBound_;

01270                 }
